quoteText: Childhood is like a lightbulb; you have to savour the flavour.

The truth is, most of us discover where we are headed when we arrive.
If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
If you can find even one person you really like, you're lucky. And if that person can also stand you, you're really lucky.
Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
Many people think that if something worked yesterday and continues to work today, it will work tomorrow. That's wrong.

The further a society drifts from the truth, the more it will hate those that speak it.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.
A leader is best when people barely know he exists. When his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise. Seek what they sought.
Falling down is not a failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.

The more you do something, the more you do it.
Engine go kaboom. Thus is engineering.
